bike.description: Jamis Road Dyad Elite M30/T700 Monocoque Carbon Fiber Frame, FEA optimized Near Net SPV molding process, formed top and down tubes with SST tubing diameters, oversized tapered seat tube, 1 1/8-1 1/2" head tube with carbon bearing races, EVO386 carbon BB shell, ACE internal cable routing compatible for both Di2 wires or traditional cables, rider tuned twin seat stays with spoiler bridge, oversized asymmetrical chainstays with direct mount brakes, carbon drop outs with replaceable alloy FD mount and RD hanger.

components.description: Jamis WindShield II Aero carbon composite fork, FEA optimized Near Net SPV molding process, rear-facing front brake to reduced aerodynamic drag, 1.5" hollow formed crown, monocoque one-piece forming technology, carbon dropouts with stainless axle interfaces
Ritchey Pro Drop-In, sealed bearing with nylon upper Compression ring,1 1/8-1 1/2"
American Classic 420 Aero 3 wheelset, 18/24H, 34mm aero rims, RD-205/Micro 58 hubs with stainless steel cartridge bearings including QR and AC stainless steel bladed spokes
Vittoria Rubino Pro Slick, 700 x 23c, folding
SRAM Force22 11-Speed derailleurs with YAW Technology
SRAM Force22 GXP with YAW Technology, 53/39T, 170mm (48/51), 172.5mm (54/56), 175mm (58/61)
FSA EVO PressFit 30 with Wheels MFG EVO adaptors
Shimano Ultegra BR-6810 direct mount Super SLR dual pivot calipers and TRP TTV linear pull direct mount front with cartridge pads and SRAM Force22 brake levers
Ritchey Pro EVO Curve, 7075 triple-butted aluminum, 31.8 x 400mm (48/51), 420mm (54/56), 440mm (58/61)
Jamis gel suede tape with Jamis logo and "J" end plug
Ritchey Pro Carbon, 31.6 x 350mm with Jamis 7075-AL CNC aluminum 1-bolt seat post clamp
Selle San Marco Concor with Microfil cover and hollow chromoly-moly rails
